headline: Why the Market Dipped But Enphase Energy (ENPH) Gained Today
summary: The latest trading day saw Enphase Energy (ENPH) settling at $36.71, representing a +1.89% change from its previous close.

headline: Enphase Energy Adds Smart Water Heater Control in Belgium, the Netherlands, and Switzerland
summary: FREMONT, Calif., Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: ENPH), a global energy technology company and the world's leading supplier of microinverter-based solar and battery systems, today announced the expansion of its IQ® Energy Management capabilities to include select electric water heaters in Belgium, the Netherlands, and Switzerland. The update, powered by the Enphase® IQ® Energy Router, gives homeowners more control over when and how they use energy – across solar,

headline: What to Expect From Enphase Energy’s Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: Enphase Energy is all geared to release its third-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts expect its bottom line to drop in double digits.
